# listPlainCell()

**Type Method**

Creates the default configuration you use to style a cell in a plain list.

## Declaration

```swift
static func listPlainCell() -> UIBackgroundConfiguration
```

## Return Value

The default configuration for a cell in a plain list.

## Discussion

Create this configuration to update the styling for the background of a cell in a list. When you apply this configuration to a cell, the background of the cell matches the system default styling for a plain cell, including styling for highlighted and selected states.

For an appearance consistent with system defaults, use this background configuration for a cell in these contexts:

- A table view that you configure with the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITableView/Style-swift.enum/plain] enumeration case.
- A collection view list that you configure with the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICollectionLayoutListConfiguration-swift.struct/Appearance-swift.enum/plain] enumeration case.

## Creating cell background configurations

- **listGroupedCell()**: Creates the default configuration you use to style a cell in a grouped list.
- **listSidebarCell()**: Creates the default configuration you use to style a cell in a sidebar list.
- **listAccompaniedSidebarCell()**: Creates the default configuration you use to style a cell in an accompanied sidebar list.
